channel.title: Weapons hitting fast
channel.description:
Certain weapons keep hitting fast such as scimitars and dragon longsword. Is there a way to fix this problem? It seems like a glitch. when you logout and back in with certain weapons it happen. Can someone please help explain what might be the problem. The source is richscape 4.2.
A list of weapons i have found are: Iron Scimitar Mithril Scimitar Dragon Longsword
Thank you,
SchecterPK

item.title: Weapons hitting fast
item.dc:creator: @SchecterPK SchecterPK
item.description:

Certain weapons keep hitting fast such as scimitars and dragon longsword. Is there a way to fix this problem? It seems like a glitch. when you logout and back in with certain weapons it happen. Can someone please help explain what might be the problem. The source is richscape 4.2.
